name: Orc
description: Orcs are fearsome, green-skinned humanoids known for their strength, aggression, and warrior culture. They are often found in tribes, living a nomadic lifestyle and waging war against neighboring civilizations. Orcs value strength, power, and honor in battle, and they are known to be brutal and relentless in combat.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.
special: Aggressive: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear.
